ygData.subject: will weapon skill increase if using against weak monster?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok i am level 14 now and i have been using 1h weapons for the sake of shield. But recently i found out that necro can t wield a shield(doh!) so i decide to
ygData.messageBody:
Ok i am level 14 now and i have been using 1h weapons for the sake of
shield. But recently i found out that necro can't wield a shield(doh!) so i
decide to switch to 2h blunt weapon. It's kinda dangerous now for me to
melee monster that con black to me cuz they usually hit 30 dam per hit and i
don't get to practice my 2h blunt much.

my quetsion is does 2h blunt skill increase if u melee low level creatures?
